item.title: 印度最大银行将成立人工智能和金融科技项目融资部门
item.description: 据一位高级管理人员透露，印度最大的贷款机构印度国家银行正在成立一个部门，负责管理人工智能、电子商务和金融科技等 "新时代产业 "的项目融资解决方案。【原文：State Bank of India, the country’s largest lender, is setting up a unit to manage project financing solutions for “new age industries” such as artificial intelligence, e-commerce, and fintech, according to a senior executive.】

item.title: 竞标战蔓延，曼哈顿公寓租金跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在激烈的竞争中，曼哈顿的公寓租金在 2 月份飙升至历史新高，其中超过四分之一的交易出现了竞标战。【原文：Manhattan apartment rents soared to a record high in February amid intense competition, including bidding wars in a more than a quarter of all deals.】

item.title: 纽约人口反弹面临特朗普移民计划的考验
item.description: 根据人口普查局的估计，纽约市的人口正在重新增长，这是在大流行病早期损失最大的许多地区出现的广泛反弹的一部分。【原文：New York City’s population is growing again, according to Census Bureau estimates, part of a broader rebound in many areas that saw the largest losses in the pandemic’s early years.】

item.title: 新加坡服务器欺诈案嫌犯获保释，调查仍在继续
item.description: 新加坡一名法官批准三名男子保释，他们涉嫌欺骗服务器计算机供应商，这些计算机可能含有受美国出口限制的 Nvidia 公司芯片。【原文：A Singapore judge granted bail for the three men suspected of defrauding suppliers of server computers potentially containing Nvidia Corp. chips subject to US export curbs.】

item.title: 泰国酒店业者计划向美国扩张，借白莲花热潮套现
item.description: Minor International Pcl 公司在泰国的酒店在热播剧《白莲花》中有精彩表演，该公司计划在美国拓展业务，以利用新发现的全球声誉，自上个月该剧开播以来，客房预订量急剧上升。【原文：Minor International Pcl, whose hotels in Thailand feature in the hit series White Lotus, plans to expand in the US to cash in on the newfound global fame that’s seen room bookings skyrocket since the show began airing last month.】

item.title: 花旗集团称，关税加征前铜价可达到 10,000 美元
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）称，未来三个月铜价将达到每吨 10,000 美元。【原文：Copper will hit $10,000 a ton in the coming three months, according to Citigroup Inc., which said the global market will remain tight until the timeline for US import tariffs becomes clearer.】

item.title: 特朗普的 1.4 万亿美元关税威胁促使企业寻求庇护
item.description: Ozempic生产商诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）正计划在越南生产更多供应美国市场的药品；波音公司（Boeing Co.【原文：Ozempic-maker Novo Nordisk A/S is planning to make more of its medicines for the US market in the country; Boeing Co. risks a gummed up supply chain and higher aircraft costs it may not be able to pass on; Chinese online retailer Shein Group Ltd. is offering incentives to its top apparel providers to set up new production capacity in Vietnam.】

item.title: 原油价格下跌，降息希望可能让印度股市重回正轨
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 台湾警告股票外流和特朗普政策带来的货币风险
item.description: 台湾央行去年为保护本国货币花费了创纪录的巨额资金，鉴于股市外流加剧和贸易紧张局势升级，台湾央行可能需要采取更多措施。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank spent a record amount of money defending its currency last year and may need to do more, given worsening stock market outflows and escalating trade tensions.】

item.title: 韩国 DN Solutions 据称将在首尔首次公开募股中募集约 10 亿美元资金
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，韩国机械制造商 DN Solutions Co. 将在首尔首次公开募股，募集 8 亿至 10 亿美元，这可能是韩国今年最大的此类交易。【原文：South Korean machinery maker DN Solutions Co. is seeking $800 million to $1 billion in an initial public offering in Seoul, people familiar with the matter said, in what could be the country’s largest such deal this year.】

item.title: 香港考虑降低购买最昂贵股票的门槛
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港证券交易所正在讨论降低投资者购买该市一些最昂贵股票的门槛，以刺激交易的方案。【原文：Hong Kong’s stock exchange is discussing options to lower the threshold for investors to buy some of the city’s most expensive stocks to stoke trading, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消费者情绪低迷影响利润，Samsonite 将推进美国上市计划
item.description: Samsonite International SA 表示，由于消费者情绪弱于预期和全球零售流量放缓，该公司利润下降，但仍在继续朝着可能在美国两地上市的方向取得进展。【原文：Samsonite International SA says it continues to make progress toward a potential dual listing in the US, as profit fell amid weaker-than-expected consumer sentiment and slower retail traffic globally.】

item.title: 安瓦尔否认马来西亚用投资拯救萨普拉能源公司
item.description: 总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，他已下令对萨普拉能源有限公司（Sapura Energy Bhd.【原文：Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said he had ordered an audit of Sapura Energy Bhd. and a change of management before approving a controversial 1.1 billion ringgit ($248.2 million) injection into the cash-strapped oil and gas firm.】

item.title: 韩国为特朗普关税后的市场混乱做好准备
item.description: 韩国代总统崔相木敦促最高决策者为唐纳德-特朗普总统着手对全球钢铁和铝进口征收 25% 关税的计划后可能出现的市场混乱做好准备。【原文：South Korea’s Acting President Choi Sang-mok urged top policymakers to prepare for possible market disruptions after President Donald Trump proceeded with plans to apply 25% tariffs on global steel and aluminum imports.】

item.title: 中国市场受挫后，LVMH 旗下丝芙兰全面调整亚洲区领导层
item.description: 丝芙兰首席执行官纪尧姆-莫特（Guillaume Motte）亲自负责其在中国的业务，这是这家路威酩轩集团（LVMH）旗下的化妆品零售商为赢得世界第二大经济体消费者的青睐而做出的最新管理调整。【原文：Sephora Chief Executive Officer Guillaume Motte has taken personal charge of its operations in China, the latest management shift at the LVMH-owned cosmetics retailer as it struggles to win over consumers in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 库什-塔德（Couche-Tard）排除了敌方接管日本七枚导弹的可能性；i
item.description: 加拿大便利店和加油站运营商 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.【原文：Canadian convenience store and gas station operator Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. said it won’t go hostile in its attempt to acquire long-time rival Seven & i Holdings Co.】

item.title: 美股盘后交易在亚洲升温
item.description: 据一个流行平台的数据显示，去年亚洲投资者在正常交易时间段外加大了对美股的交易力度，这是股票交易日益转向全时段交易的一个迹象。【原文：Investors in Asia ramped up their trading of US stocks outside of normal market hours last year, according to data from a popular platform, a sign of the increasing shift to all-hours equities trading.】

item.title: 汇丰在改革中短期留用部分银行家
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）在新任首席执行官乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery）的领导下进行大刀阔斧的改革，在清理各项业务的过程中，将对部分投资银行家签订短期留用协议。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is placing some of its investment bankers on short-term retention agreements as it winds down various businesses in a broad overhaul led by new Chief Executive Officer Georges Elhedery, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官表示将坚持有争议的代工厂计划
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp.即将上任的英特尔公司首席执行官陈立武表示，他将坚持前任的计划，为其他公司生产芯片，同时他也发誓要从过去的错误中吸取教训。【原文：Incoming Intel Corp. Chief Executive Officer Lip-Bu Tan is signaling that he’ll stick with his predecessor’s plan to make chips for other companies, even as he vows to learn from past mistakes.】

item.title: Ares 寻求从银行购买新世界发展债务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Ares Management Corp. 最近几周至少与两家银行进行了接触，希望购买它们持有的香港开发商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Ares Management Corp. approached at least two banks in recent weeks to purchase their holdings of debt issued by Hong Kong developer New World Development Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 调查人员预测伦敦房价将出现英国最严重的下跌
item.description: 据房产中介称，由于首都受到经济不确定性和高税收的严重影响，伦敦的房价在短期内将创下英国最大跌幅。【原文：London is expected to record the largest drop in house prices in the UK in the near term, according to property agents, as the capital is disproportionately hit by economic uncertainty and higher taxes.】

item.title: 越南追逐美国交易，高官飞赴越南会见特朗普团队
item.description: 越南最高贸易官员即将前往美国，希望说服唐纳德-特朗普总统的团队，让他们相信河内对重启贸易关系是认真的，以避免关税可能对其出口导向型经济造成冲击。【原文：Vietnam’s top trade official is heading to the US in a bid to persuade President Donald Trump’s team that Hanoi is serious about resetting trade ties, to avert tariffs that could rattle its export-driven economy.】

item.title: 美国通胀缓解提振市场情绪，石油保持大幅上涨
item.description: 由于美国通胀放缓对更广泛的金融市场情绪有所帮助，石油价格在两周来的最大涨幅之后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied, after the biggest gain in two weeks, as easing US inflation aided broader financial market sentiment.】

item.title: 卡尼周五接任加拿大领导人后将缩减内阁规模
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，马克-卡尼将于周五宣誓就任加拿大第 24 任总理，新内阁的规模可能只有贾斯汀-特鲁多的行政部门的一半左右。【原文：Mark Carney will be sworn in as Canada’s 24th prime minister on Friday, along with a new cabinet that may be about half the size of Justin Trudeau’s executive, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 星展集团首位女首席执行官面临逆风，将人工智能视为游戏规则的改变者
item.description: 1995 年霸菱银行倒闭后，Tan Su Shan 失去了工作，她的香港房东认为她可能付不起房租，于是将她赶了出去。同一周，她的长期男友与她分手。两年后，她决定降薪加入另一家公司。【原文：When Barings Bank collapsed in 1995, Tan Su Shan lost her job and was evicted after her Hong Kong landlord thought she might not be able to pay rent. Her long-term boyfriend broke up with her the same week. Two years later, she decided to take a pay cut to join another firm.】

item.title: 台积电遭抛售，台股遭遇创纪录外资抛售
item.description: 由于重量级企业台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwanese shares saw their worst-ever selling streak by foreign investors as heavyweight Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. fell out of favor.】

item.title: 美国通胀疲软后亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在美国通胀率低于预期帮助华尔街从连续两天的重挫中反弹之后，亚洲股市周四早盘开始上涨。【原文：Asian equities were primed for early gains Thursday after cooler-than-forecast US inflation helped Wall Street rebound from two days of heavy losses.】

item.title: 斯塔默认为英国在推进数字化和人工智能方面可节约 450 亿英镑
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）将宣布一项重塑英国国家的 "数字革命 "计划，称公共服务数字化和利用人工智能可以每年节省 450 亿英镑（580 亿美元）的生产成本。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer is set to announce plans for a “digital revolution” to reshape the British state, saying that digitizing public services and harnessing artificial intelligence could unlock £45 billion ($58 billion) in annual productivity savings.】

item.title: 加拿大央行显示通胀将影响贸易战对策
item.description: 加拿大央行明确表示，全球各国央行正在打一场与大流行病完全不同的战争；但在决策者们试图保护本国经济免受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税大棒冲击时，后科维德时代的通胀担忧正困扰着他们。【原文：The Bank of Canada made clear that central banks around the world are fighting an entirely different war than the pandemic — but post-Covid inflation fears are haunting policymakers as they try to protect their economies from US President Donald Trump’s tariff barrage.】

item.title: 加拿大 210 亿美元反倾销税涉及金属和高尔夫球
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对钢铁和铝征收全球关税后，加拿大周三公布了一份报复性关税清单，适用于298亿加元（207亿美元）的美国商品，其中包括特朗普最喜欢的消遣项目。【原文：After US President Donald Trump imposed global tariffs on steel and aluminum, Canada on Wednesday revealed a list of retaliatory duties that apply to C$29.8 billion ($20.7 billion) of American goods — including ones used for Trump’s favorite pastime.】
